import React from 'react' import { Fragment , useEffect } from 'react' import { useParams, Route, Link, useRouteMatch } from 'react-router-dom' import Comments from '../components/comments/Comments' import HighlightedQuote from '../components/quotes/HighlightedQuote' import useHttp from '../hooks/use-http' import { getSingleQuote } from '../components/lib/api' const QuoteDetails = () => { const params = useParams() const match = useRouteMatch() const{ sendRequest , status , data:loadedQuotes , error } = useHttp(getSingleQuote, true) console.log(params) const DUMMMY_QUOTES = [ {id:'q1' , author:'schad Botombe', text:'Learning react is fun!!' }, {id:'q2' , author:'fred legusta', text:'Learning react is fun!!' }, {id:'q3' , author:'tom hendricks', text:'Learning react is fun!!' }, ] const quote = DUMMMY_QUOTES.find(quote => quote.id === params.quoteId) if(!quote){ return

) } export default QuoteDetails
